steps.script:
machine = frappe.get_doc("Virtual Machine", doc.virtual_machine)
machine.provision()

machine = frappe.get_doc("Virtual Machine", doc.virtual_machine)
machine.sync()
result = (machine.status == "Running", False)

server = frappe.get_doc(doc.server_type, doc.server)
server.ping_ansible()

plays = frappe.get_all("Ansible Play", {"server": doc.server, "play": "Ping Server"}, ["status"], order_by="creation desc", limit=1)
result = (plays and plays[0].status == "Success", False)
steps.step_name: Wait for Server to be accessible

steps.script:
server = frappe.get_doc("Database Server", doc.server)
server.stop_mariadb()

plays = frappe.get_all("Ansible Play", {"server": doc.server, "play": "Stop MariaDB"}, ["status"], order_by="creation desc", limit=1)
result = (plays and plays[0].status == "Success", False)

machine = frappe.get_doc("Virtual Machine", doc.virtual_machine)
machine.create_snapshots()
snapshot = frappe.get_last_doc("Virtual Disk Snapshot", {"virtual_machine": doc.virtual_machine})
snapshot.add_comment(text="Before MariaDB Upgrade")

server = frappe.get_doc("Database Server", doc.server)
server.upgrade_mariadb()

plays = frappe.get_all("Ansible Play", {"server": doc.server, "play": "Upgrade MariaDB"}, ["status"], order_by="creation desc", limit=1)
result = (plays and plays[0].status == "Success", plays and plays[0].status == "Failure")
steps.step_name: Wait for MariaDB Upgrade to Complete

steps.script:
server = frappe.get_doc(doc.server_type, doc.server)
mountpoint = arguments.labels.get("mountpoint")
server.calculated_increase_disk_size(mountpoint=mountpoint)

server = frappe.get_doc(doc.server_type, doc.server)
if server.provider == "OCI":
    machine = frappe.get_doc("Virtual Machine", doc.virtual_machine)
    machine.sync()
    result = (machine.status == "Running", False)
else:
    result = (True, False)

server = frappe.get_doc(doc.server_type, doc.server)
if server.provider == "OCI":
    server.ping_ansible()

    plays = frappe.get_all("Ansible Play", {"server": doc.server, "play": "Ping Server"}, ["status"], order_by="creation desc", limit=1)
    result = (plays and plays[0].status == "Success", False)
else:
    result = (True, False)
steps.step_name: Wait for server to be accessible (OCI)
